ygData.subject: RE: [archive-crawler] Heritrix Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya all, We found the problem, Heritrix was writing to an NFS directory, when we moved it to the local file system everything started working fine. Cheers,

Hiya all,

We found the problem, Heritrix was writing to an NFS directory, =
when we
moved it to the local file system everything started working fine.
=

Cheers,

Jack

Jackson Pope
Technical Lead
Web Archiving Team

Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Heritrix Problems

Hi Jack,

I am not sure=
 what the problem is, but here some thoughts.

Maybe there is an attempt to=
 register or create a new MBean that already

exists. Are you "redeploying"=
 production kit? Maybe a fresh production 
deploy would clear the problem.
=

Do you have full stack traces for these exception? I think those would 
he=
lp diagnose the problem. Do you know what heritrix feature WCT is 
trying t=
o access every 10 minutes via JMX (if any)?

Take care,
i.

 wrote:

>

rix 1.8 running under WCT.

mcat user
owns

and

sible through jconsole, where it
